why: Slack messaged D saying “sorry, i'm not clear...i can't make the meeting with the whole adjacent team. will def still make the one today for design.”
Whispered “sorry” to the professor after coming back from the bathroom in the middle of class.
Said “sorry not explaining this well” as I was explaining Adjacent stuff to my teammate.
“Sorry we kinda kicked you out from the table, didnt we?” as our Adjacent design team invaded a whole table where one person was sitting
“Sorry is that in your way?” to someone because my charger was in someone's walking path.
Texted “sorry, i didn’t see your messages been such a hectic day” to K after not responding to his texts for a couple hours.
“Sorry” when I accidentally bumped into someone as I was getting out of R train to get to B train.
Said“sorry about all the messages” to K over phone for not responding to his texts in a timely way
Over the phone, I said “sorry” to K for calling him so early to talk to him about a problem I have.
“Sorry I'm late” to Live Web teammate who was already working.
“Sorry you got paired with the slow coder” to Live Web teammate.
“Sorry” to K for accidentally stepping on his foot in Starbucks.
“Sorry” to grocery store person. I tried to help her rearrange but ended up making it worse.
“Sorry” to a lady I almost bumped into at the grocery store.
“Sorry” to K for not eating a popsicle with him.
“Sorry” to K for asking him to check the p5 editor to see if it was down for him too.
“Sorry” when I accidentally bumped my foot against K's.
“Sorry I didn’t sit with you on friday” to J when I saw him before class.
“Sorry I thought we had to continue the arms” when playing Exquisite Corps in the Joy and Games class
“Sorry is my hand in your way?” to classmates when playing a drawing game in Joy and Games class.
“Sorry” to T as I tried to get out of the room to throw away trash.
“Sorry for not telling you about the mtg on friday!...” to W (teammate) on Adjacent Slack.
“Sorry” to random person as I almost bump into them when walking out of library
“Sorry” to K because we agreed to meet up at F station but he has to walk over from R station
“Excuse me, sorry” to waiter as I almost bumped into him at Celestine restaurant for our anniversary dinner.
“Sorry” asked our server to take our photo and I almost dropped the phone as I went to get the phone back
“Sorry” to K for interrupting dinner to write the previous sorry post.
“Sorry” to K because we ordered way to expensive $6 sparkling water at the restaurant.
“Sorry” to the person who got our bags from the coat check because my backpack was very heavy and he had to hand it over to us.
“Sorry” to K because I decided to sit in the subway even though it was only 1 stop. My backpack was very heavy.
“Sorry” to K because I bumped into him in CVS.
“Sorry” to K because I kept saying how happy I was for coding faster and more comfortably than usual.
“Sorry” to K because I bumped into his arm in bed.
“Sorry” to K because I bumped into his arm in bed.
“Sorry” to stranger because I almost into them in the subway.
“Sorry” to someone with coffee who I almost bumped in Au Bon Pain.
“Sorry” to S because I bumped into him on my way out of the classroom to go to the bathroom.
“Sorry this is an aesthetic question” to S during office hours.
“Sorry” as I bumped into someone when stepping outside of Au Bon Pain.
“Sorry” as I bumped into someone when stepping outside of Au Bon Pain.
“Sorry” to people in Understanding Networks tour as I bump into them.
“Sorry” to K on the phone for coming back from campus for our dinner date later than expected.
“Sorry” to K for being late when I saw him in person.
“Sorry I'm late” to T for being late for meeting up to do last minute touches to our Live Web project.
“Sorry I wanted to keep things clean” to T because I wanted to rename our code file.
“Sorry for messing it up in office hour earlier today. totally forgot you had replaced the files” to T as we were coding.
“Sorry can I get a paper bag instead?” to Highway Bagel cashier when he handed me a plastic bag.
“Sorry” whispered to stranger because I almost bumped into him when stepping out of subway.
“Oh dibner is on the 3rd floor of the building, but there are 2 floors in the 3rd floor, sorry” by text to N. We were trying to meet up in the library for homework reasons.
“Sorry” to N for not being able to fix her code. I genuinely felt bad that I couldn’t be more helpful.
“Sorry I couldn't figure out your code” to N after trying to troubleshoot.
“sorry” to stranger in Au Bon Pain for spilling a straw on the counter top where she was.
“sorry” to stranger in Au Bon Pain for spilling a straw on the counter top where she was.
“Sorry” to K for being late to showing up at station to commute home together.
“Sorry” accidentally brushed my foot against K's while working at our living room table.
“Sorry” to my mom in Chinese over the phone for not being able to talk to her Monday.
“I’m sorry you’re waiting for me” to K because i kept coding even though he wanted to go to bed.
“excuse me, sorry” to stranger in Dunkin' Donuts.
“sorry” to driver who honked at me as I crossed the street because the walking sign was not on.
“Sorry” to stranger in Pret A Manger because I was on my phone in front of where the cream and straws were.
“So sorry to hear about your wifi…” in an email to undergraduate student in a course that I am a GA for.
“sorry I couldn’t figure out what was wrong” to N for not being helpful yesterday.
“sorry i thought you were done” to K because I started reading an article when I thought he was done talking.
